files.title: An Initiation to Domain-Driven Design
files.description: Domain-driven design offers a number of patterns that help deliver clean, cohesive, scalable code. Let's review some of these.
files.keywords: domain driven design, DDD, clean code, programming

files.title: A Simple Guide for Choosing the Right Database
files.description: Why would you pick PostgreSQL to support your next application when you have dozens of alternatives to choose from? Understanding what a data model is will help you understand what database you should use.
files.keywords: database, system design, sql, nosql, postgresql, backend
